summary: This is a secured message reply from Matthew Goldsmith regarding a LERT case (#190114588) concerning a target MDN (mobile device number). The response indicates the target MDN was with T-Mobile between October 2002 and November 2012 and provides contact information.

persons.name: Matthew Goldsmith
persons.context: He is the sender of the secured message reply regarding the LERT case packet titled 'email'.

events.title: Target MDN service start with T-Mobile
events.description: The target mobile device number (MDN) began service with T-Mobile.

events.title: Target MDN service end with T-Mobile
events.description: The target mobile device number (MDN) ended service with T-Mobile.

events.title: LERT case response sent
events.description: Matthew Goldsmith sent a secured message reply with the case response for LERT case #190114588.

keyFacts: The document is a response to a LERT (likely a law enforcement or investigative request tool) case #190114588 concerning a target mobile device number (MDN).
The target MDN was associated with T-Mobile from October 7, 2002, to November 22, 2012.
The response was sent via a secured messaging system on July 24, 2019, by Matthew Goldsmith.
